mapper.insert: INSERT INTO erp_member_info(member_info_key, member_info_id, member_info_pass, member_info_name, member_info_resident, dept_key) VALUES(#{member_info_key}, #{member_info_id}, #{member_info_pass}, #{member_info_name}, #{member_info_resident}, #{dept_key})
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, d.dept_name FROM erp_member_info m INNER JOIN erp_dept d ON m.dept_key = d.dept_key WHERE member_info_id = #{member_info_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE erp_member_info SET member_info_id = #{member_info_id}, member_info_pass = #{member_info_pass}, member_info_phone = #{member_info_phone}, member_info_address1 = #{member_info_address1}, member_info_address2 = #{member_info_address2}, member_info_email = #{member_info_email}, member_info_account = #{member_info_account} WHERE member_info_key = #{member_info_key}
UPDATE erp_member_info SET dept_key = #{dept_key} WHERE member_info_key = #{member_info_key}
UPDATE erp_member_info SET member_info_job = #{member_info_job} WHERE member_info_key = #{member_info_key}
UPDATE erp_member_info SET member_info_auth = #{member_info_auth} WHERE member_info_key = #{member_info_key}
